name: x-lackbots
description: Slack bots for better workflow, alignment and productivity at development projects

scripts.build:
echo "
1. babel transpiling..." && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src -d dist --presets babel-preset-es2015 -s --copy-files
scripts.start:
npm run -s build && echo "
2. node starting up...
" && node ./dist/main.js

author: Felipe Monobe
